it.valsecchi.quickagenda.windows

Class MainWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • it.valsecchi.quickagenda.windows.MainWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class MainWindow
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Finestra principale dellì'applicazione. La finestra mostra l'agenda con il calendario e i pulsanti per aprire i vari manager.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Davide Valsecchi
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
